about_the_game:
The inhabitants of Earth had left behind concepts such as famine, aging, disease, and death, forming a society free from all sorts of fear and anxiety. Equipped with supernatural powers, advanced technology, and magic, this community would have to confront their forgotten fears when faced with a mysterious mass of light rapidly approaching from outer space. In the face of this unexpected threat, did they possess the power to stop this light?

Game Start and Progress:

Taita Eamon, the main character of our game, has faced racism throughout his life because he is human. After battling numerous challenges, Taita, through his determined efforts, has managed to secure a job at a prestigious science institution like Innovatorium Tech Labs, where he begins working as a scientist. As he fights against the destructive 'Light' disaster that threatens to engulf the world, can Taita save the world from this calamity and restore humanity's reputation?

In this cyberpunk-themed game, featuring various races and a deep narrative structure, we aim to offer you an experience of six hours or more. The nine different endings you will encounter throughout the game are designed to present different paths depending on the choices you make during the game, rather than your immediate decisions.







  • TTRPGs are among the games we enjoy playing the most. The unique adventures we experience over hours at the table became stories and indelible memories that we share with enthusiasm, embedding them into our minds. As the Seals and Equilibria team, we are delighted to present the science fiction and fantasy universe "The Tower Stories," which we have been working on for over ten years, in a visual novel format through Grdap Entertainment. The many TTRPG sessions we have held in the "Tower Stories" universe have allowed us to shape this universe into the form we envisioned.




  • The most crucial aspect we focus on in the Tower Stories universe is the timeline of the universe. Thanks to this detailed timeline, we can meticulously study the universe's different periods, the species that can adapt to these periods, and the periodic adaptations. Our goal of creating a living world makes the character creation process more natural and sincere and also provides us with the opportunity to enrich our universe. When designing a story, we decide on the time period it will take place in as the first step, and then the story naturally takes shape.




  • As you can see, there's a color and number combination like 'green 1' next to the name 'The Tower Stories.' You might be wondering what this combination means. As mentioned before, our universe has a timeline and various periods. These colors refer to significant individuals shaping each period, and the numbers indicate which series of the period represented by that color. We use the name 'green 1' because we are currently presenting the first series of the green period. You might soon encounter a period name like 'red 1,' as our next project will cover the red period.




  • Purchasing this visual novel ensures you own all the chapters in the 'The Tower Stories Green 1' series, excluding the two planned DLCs. In other words, the chapters will not be sold individually. So, what are these future chapters? Here are the details about the upcoming chapters!

  • Chapter 0: Towards the Light

  • Chapter 1: Awakening

  • Chapter 2: The Breath of Dusts

  • Final Chapter 3: The Tower

  • DLC Content: Shadows Before the Light (Additional Chapter)

  • DLC Content: The Man in the Dungeon (Manga-Style Comic, +130 Pages)





  • We'd like to invite you to our Discord server, where you can interact with us and other fans, share ideas and keep in touch with our upcoming releases.

content_descriptors.notes: In today's world, the human population is declining, and survival is becoming increasingly challenging. In this chaotic era, people must break free from an environment filled with violence and aggression to chart their own path. No matter how much they claim this world as their own, they rely on you. And now, the path you choose will either lead everyone to salvation or drive everyone to extinction.
